sessions.title: LLM Context Capability Testing & CLI Population
sessions.author: @kpblcaoo
sessions.context_notes: Testing LLM capabilities with context usage and CLI population. Focus on validating context modes, token budgets, and LLM integration across different scenarios. Creating comprehensive testing framework for 'LLM brothers' collaboration.
session_goals: Create new branch for LLM capability testing
Test token budget management across modes
Assess CLI population by AI agents
results: Created test_context_orchestration.py with full testing framework
Established branch strategy for capability testing
sessions.summary: Active AI session focused on LLM context capability testing and CLI population validation

sessions.title: JSON script abstraction for all modes
sessions.author: @kpblcaoo
sessions.context_notes: В этой сессии реализуем переход на работу с JSON только через скрипты. В knowledge_cache — всё, что нужно для быстрой работы.
